name: WindowPANE
short_description:
This is an operating system, starting with with a simple "Hello, World" OS and eventually develop into 2 stages:
1.  Run Windows Drivers and software plus OS X software with an OS X Install DVD.
2.  Run Windows and OS X software within its own code.
